headline: S&P Global (SPGI) Traded Lower on Lowered Guidance
summary: Brown Advisory, an investment management company, released its “Brown Advisory Large-Cap Growth Strategy” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The Brown Advisory Large-Cap Growth strategy has shown resilience this year amid heightened volatility, protecting investor capital during market declines and participating in the strong rebound since early April. […]

headline: S&P Global Ratings affirmed Oma Savings Bank Plc's credit rating and changed outlook to negative
summary: OMA SAVINGS BANK PLC STOCK EXCHANGE RELEASE 10 SEPTEMBER 2025 AT 1.25 P.M. EET, OTHER INFORMATION DISCLOSED ACCORDING TO THE RULES OF THE EXCHANGE S&P Global Ratings affirmed Oma Savings Bank Plc's credit rating and changed outlook to negative On 10.9.2025 June 2025, S&P Global Ratings (S&P) has affirmed that the short-term and long-term issuer credit ratings of Oma Savings Bank Plc (OmaSp or the Company) remain unchanged and are BBB/A-2. At the same time, S&P has changed OmaSp's outlook from st
